channel.title: When I start workstation, the command line hangs and nothing happens
channel.description: This is the first time I have had this problem with running whonix. I started virtualvox as usual, then gataway and workstation. Previously when starting the machine a command line window would pop up with text and the machine would start, now it is on the same state and I don't know how to fix this error. What i should type after "(initramfs)" ? Help me fix it please

item.title: When I start workstation, the command line hangs and nothing happens
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Not terribly useful however I’ve just now created a new wiki page with potential causes and solutions.

Kicksecure – 11 Sep 22

Broken Boot

System is no longer booting?

(Whonix is based on Kicksecure.)

Read full topic
item.source: When I start workstation, the command line hangs and nothing happens

item.title: When I start workstation, the command line hangs and nothing happens
item.dc:creator: John311
item.description:
This is the first time I have had this problem with running whonix. I started virtualvox as usual, then gataway and workstation. Previously when starting the machine a command line window would pop up with text and the machine would start, now it is on the same state and I don’t know how to fix this error. What i should type after “(initramfs)” ?
Help me fix it please

Read full topic
